Articles.Content: These models are not mine and do not belong to me, they belong to the people who created them and they rock, i thought i would just share repaints to see what people would think of them

Several things here. First, this was the wrong forum to post in. Projects and Releases have their own forum.

Second, all you did was paint bucket a bright orange onto the textures and not a very good job at that. Are you trying to learn how to texture?

Lastly, do you have permission from the original authors to reused their work, specifically the Rock Bird by Alejandro A Eelman?

That last one is a real kicker, people really don't like their work used without their permission and can get you into trouble here.

As it stands, I'm not using my Moderator voice as I don't yet see the need to pull rank, but I would like to know what you are trying to accomplish here.

Skunky

Okay good point at the last one so i will immediately remove it and get proper permissions, and secondly, i can texture VERY good on certain games like for example Grand Theft Auto San Andreas, but some games like Kerbal i have just started playing yesterday and i am trying to get used to texturing things on this new game, you will see these things get better once i get used to actually texturing them better, being as i just started the game, and i apologize about the permissions part and i will re-upload after i get permission to do these things and then i will experiment and get used to texturing in this game, cheers!

Good enough.

I didn't mean to come off like a dick or anything, it was just that it really didn't seem like you put much effort into making these and were just trying to ride on someone else's work.

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
